Information:
This is open source bot for stashing in Telegram Messenger.
The code you can find here: https://github.com/dmitrydnl/StashBot
RegistrationWarning:
⚠️ If you have already registered, you'll have lost your data!
Are you sure? /yes or /no
PasswordCharacters: ⚠️ Password can contain only letters, numbers and special characters!
Login:
🛸 Send message to save it.
Get messages: /Stash
Logout: /logout
FullStashError:
💯 Stash is full
Delete your message!
